session_history.summary: Initial project setup with VISTA documentation system
Defined core project concepts, features, and target audience
Developed comprehensive gator personas and evaluation framework
Completed user experience design with journey map, dialogue patterns, and visual style

focus_areas: Define visual integration of Pathfinder Council with existing interface
Create technical architecture diagram focusing on AI dialogue generation system
Design database schema for storing session data and user journey history
Develop implementation plan with feature prioritization and development phases
Define technical approach for integrating multiple gator panels
